bibl.title: Corporations of Craftsmen and Other Professionals in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Offers a list of corporations of craftsmen and other professionals attested in Greek papyri.

bibl.title: Münstersche [puis: Marburger] Beiträge zur antiken Handelsgeschichte

bibl.seg: Klaas A. Worp, Corporations of Craftsmen and Other Professionals in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
Offers a list of corporations of craftsmen and other professionals attested in Greek papyri.
